verses.text: \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* resting-place \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* living-place \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*?

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w who|strong="H8549"\w* \w goes|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*, \w doing|strong="H6466"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w saying|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*;

\w Whose|strong="H7453"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w is|strong="H3956"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* false, \w who|strong="H7138"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H7453"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* good name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour;

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* gives honour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, turning away \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's \w approval|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w takes|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w against|strong="H5869"\w* \w himself|strong="H3513"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H3513"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w change|strong="H4171"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H0428"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w interest|strong="H5392"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* payment \w give|strong="H5414"\w* false decisions \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0428"\w* \w who|strong="H0428"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* wrong. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H0428"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.
